fields.description:
When "fix the basic", we use temporary work around by adding count into category tree and adding sorting function for it. This is because seo-urls-category is not ready yet.

When seo-urls-category is ready, we should use this API instead of the temporary work around.
fields.summary: APM reports incorrect command document for unacknowledged bulk writes

comments.body:
QA Handoff note:
Branch name: ULIVZ-36800-integrate-seo-url-bapi

Affected pages: HP, VIP and SRP. No change in function. Only need run regression test and LNP test.

Regression test has been run by developer.

I have done the performance test for this ticket.

The performance is not got affected after the change, from the test result, we can see the reponse time is almost same comparing the master.

The test result link is as following:

Master:

http://bolt-qa-platform-1734669.lvs02.dev.ebayc3.com:8080/job/ULIVZ-BDD_master/job/QA-LoadTest-WithSpecificScript/76/performance/

Branch:

http://bolt-qa-platform-1734669.lvs02.dev.ebayc3.com:8080/job/ULIVZ-BDD_master/job/QA-LoadTest-WithSpecificScript/77/performance/
The ticket gets reverted as a result of ULIVZ-38577 and the revert commit is https://github.corp.ebay.com/ecg-global/bolt-2dot0-frontend/commit/77a4ac4ded2e77070dd918bbdbdbdbec38ee8ebe
